data.eml:eml: A revision of the Egyptian species of the genus Actorthia Kröber (Diptera: Therevidae: Phycinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Badrawy, Haitham B. M., Mohammad, Salwa K. (2013): A revision of the Egyptian species of the genus Actorthia Kröber (Diptera: Therevidae: Phycinae). Zootaxa 3613 (2): 181-189, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3613.2.6
